item.title: Nacelle Anti-Ice VALVE Lights or NAI Indications – Valve Inoperative

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided associated nacelle anti-ice valve is inoperative.

note.para: If icing conditions are inadvertently encountered, reducing thrust on affected engine will minimize possible damage if ice is ingested.

numlitem.para: Operations into known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Install Placards on NAI VALVE switch Pilot’s Overhead Panel: "NAI VLV INOP CLOSED" and "NAI VLV IND INOP". Enter items in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
